original: Sukhavedaniyaṁ dukkhavedaniyaṁ …pe… sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: sukha vedaniyam dukkha vedaniyam pe sa ārammaṇa atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi iti

original: nanu na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: nanu na sukha vedaniyam pe anārammaṇa natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi iti

original: Hañci na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci na sukha vedaniyam pe anārammaṇa natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi no ca vata re vattabbe
phasso vipāko phasso sukha vedaniyo pe
sa ārammaṇaḥ atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi iti

original: Cakkhāyatanaṁ vipāko, cakkhāyatanaṁ sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: cakkhu āyatanam vipāko cakkhu āyatanam sukha vedaniyam pe sa ārammaṇa atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi iti

original: Cakkhāyatanaṁ vipāko, cakkhāyatanaṁ na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: cakkhu āyatanam vipāko cakkhu āyatanam na sukha vedaniyam pe anārammaṇa natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi iti
phasso vipāko phasso na sukha vedaniyo pe
anārammaṇaḥ natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi iti

original: Sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: sukha vedaniyam pe sa ārammaṇa atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi iti

original: nanu na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: nanu na sukha vedaniyam pe anārammaṇa natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi iti

original: Hañci na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci na sukha vedaniyam pe anārammaṇa natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi no ca vata re vattabbe
phasso vipāko phasso sukha vedaniyo pe
sa ārammaṇaḥ atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi iti

original: Kāyāyatanaṁ vipāko, kāyāyatanaṁ sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: kāya āyatanam vipāko kāya āyatanam sukha vedaniyam pe sa ārammaṇa atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi iti

original: kāyāyatanaṁ vipāko, kāyāyatanaṁ na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
analyzed: kāya āyatanam vipākaḥ kāya āyatanam na sukha vedaniyam pe anārammaṇa natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi iti
phasso vipāko phasso na sukha vedaniyo pe
anārammaṇaḥ natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi iti

original: Hañci saḷāyatanaṁ kammassa katattā uppannaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci saḷāyatanam kammassa kata ttā uppanna tena vata re vattabbe
